name: Par-T-ake
description: This is a full-stack responsive react project where users can buy products from here. Users can go order and go to the order page. They can also go to the Dashboard.

name: Fitness care
description: This is a simple react website with routing and firebase authentication.. Where you can find the health care related tips and courses.

name: Headphones Worlds
description: This is a simple react website with routing and firebase authentication. Users can log in using email-password or google pop-up. Users cannot access the checkout page without logging in.
